decks.notes: This deck focuses on disrupting your opponent's game plan while applying pressure through aggressive creatures. By using cards like Thoughtseize and Solitude to remove threats and Ephemerate to blink creatures for added value, the deck aims to control the board and outvalue the opponent. Recruiter of the Guard and Guide of Souls ensure that your key creatures are consistently drawn and played, while Boggart Trawler and Skyclave Apparition provide additional removal options. With a mix of disruption, aggression, and value generation, this deck seeks to overpower the opponent and secure a victory.

This Mono Black Aggro deck focuses on disruption and aggression, utilizing cards like Inquisition of Kozilek and Thoughtseize to disrupt the opponent's game plan while deploying threats like Nethergoyf and Emperor of Bones to close out the game quickly. The deck also includes utility lands like Urza's Saga and Ifnir Deadlands to provide additional value and flexibility. By efficiently disrupting the opponent's strategy and presenting a fast clock, this deck aims to overwhelm the opponent before they can stabilize.
